item.title: Powell's Dovish Turn: The Fallout from the 2025 Jackson Hole Meeting
item.description: At the 2025 Jackson Hole meeting, Fed Chair Jerome Powell pivoted to a dovish stance, sparking market euphoria. As expectations for a rate cut grow, three distinct characters engage in a fierce debate, weighing the optimism against the underlying risks of an economic slowdown and inflation.
